trials.incorrectInstructionsHTML:
Incorrect response:

Say, That’s not quite right.

Say, On this screen, this one (point to sock) is first, and this one (point to apple) is next.

Say, So you should touch this one first (point to sock), and this one next (point to apple).

trials.incorrectInstructionsHTML:
Incorrect response:

Say, That’s not quite right.

Say, On this screen, this one (point to apple) is first, and this one (point to flower) is next.

Say, So you should touch this one first (point to apple), and this one next (point to flower).

If the child appears confused, repeat the explanation and allow the child to practice the task again, swiping back once and repeating Sample C, Trial 2.
